title: Bing it back gamemode

embed.description: League of Legends Amino, the largest mobile community for League of Legends fans!

body: I though about this for a while, a gamemode that would let u pick champs before they were reworked (ap {{champion:11}} :3) and items that have been removed (ty dfg). Do u guys think that it is a good idea?

replies.body: well time to bust out the dusty old jax, so I can go 1v5 in the enemy fountain.
